title: Pro-Migration Activist: Democrats' Welcome for Migrants Requires Cruelty
description:
Pro-migration Democrats must be cruel to many more future migrants if they want to avoid another migration crisis that allowed the election of President Donald Trump, says a pro-migration professor at George Mason University. 
The post Pro-Migration Activist:…
